HTC One M8S


Back
Device Folder: Z:/HTC/M8S/

Unlocking


This device is unlocked via XTC2Clip hardware

  1. Insert XTC2Clip into devices micro SD card slot
  2. Power on the device into bootloader by holding Volume down & Power buttons
  3. Wait for device to scan the SD card
  4. Scroll down to Simlock with Volume down and select with Power
  5. The device will scan the SD card, reboot and scan the card again
  6. Press Volume up to reboot the device
  7. Simlock is now removed, the device is also set to S-Off and Generic UK CID is installed (HTC__001)
  8. if the device does not require flashing set S-On and repack the unit

Flash & Debrand


  1. Set the device to S-On via XTC2Clip
  2. Boot the device into bootloader by holding Volume down & Power
  3. Select the FASTBOOT option with the Power button
  4. Connect the device to the PC
  5. Run the Flash.bat file from the device folder on the server
  6. The device will now be automatically set to Generic UK CID and will be set to S-On at the end of the flash
  7. Ensure the device is set to S-on and repack

FRP


  1. Insert the XTC2Clip into the devices SD card slot
  2. Boot the device into bootloader by holding Volume down & power
  3. Scroll down to FACTORY RESET and select it with Power
  4. FRP has now been removed from the device
